In Player Episode Preview ==================== ## üìÑ About This plugin adds an episode list to the video player, which allows you to preview every episode of the TV show without having to leave the player. This modification has support for the following clients: * [Jellyfin Web Client](https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin-web) * [Jellyfin Media Player](https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin-media-player) (JMP) Desktop Client

In Player Episode Preview ==================== ## üìÑ Sobre Este plugin adiciona uma lista de epis√≥dios ao player de v√≠deo, permitindo que voc√™ visualize cada epis√≥dio da s√©rie sem precisar sair do player. Esta modifica√ß√£o √© compat√≠vel com os seguintes clientes: * [Cliente Web Jellyfin](https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin-web) * [Jellyfin Media Player](https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin-media-player) (JMP) Cliente Desktop

Content:
## ‚ú® Features * List all episodes of a season * Switch between seasons * Shows episode title, description, thumbnail and playback progress * Shows episode details like community ranking * Mark episodes as played or favourite * Start a new episode * Should work with custom themes ## üì∏ Preview Used Theme: (SkinManager) Kaleidochromic
This preview is missing the new buttons for marking an episode as completed or favourite. ## üîß Installation ### Jellyfin Web Client (Server) > [!NOTE] > It is highly recommended to have [file-transformation](https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-file-transformation) at least v2.2.1.0 installed. It helps avoid permission issues while modifying index.html on any kind of installation!
See instructions... 1. Add the manifest `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/master/manifest.json` as a Jellyfin plugin repository to your server. 2. Install the plugin `InPlayerEpisodePreview` from the repository. 3. Restart the Jellyfin server.
### Jellyfin Media Player (JMP) Desktop Client (Deprecated)
See instructions... **Deprecated with JMP Version [1.11.0](https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin-media-player/releases/tag/v1.11.0)** Because the new JMP client is using the current web player from the server itself, it is no longer needed to make any changes to the client code directly. This is the recommended way to install the script on the desktop client.
Translation:
## ‚ú® Funcionalidades * Listar todos os epis√≥dios de uma temporada * Alternar entre temporadas * Exibir t√≠tulo do epis√≥dio, descri√ß√£o, miniatura e progresso de reprodu√ß√£o * Exibir detalhes do epis√≥dio como ranking da comunidade * Marcar epis√≥dios como reproduzidos ou favoritos * Iniciar um novo epis√≥dio * Deve funcionar com temas personalizados ## üì∏ Pr√©via Tema utilizado: (SkinManager) Kaleidochromic
Esta pr√©via n√£o mostra os novos bot√µes para marcar um epis√≥dio como conclu√≠do ou favorito. ## üîß Instala√ß√£o ### Cliente Web Jellyfin (Servidor) > [!NOTA] > √â altamente recomendado ter [file-transformation](https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-file-transformation) pelo menos na vers√£o v2.2.1.0 instalada. Isso ajuda a evitar problemas de permiss√£o ao modificar o index.html em qualquer tipo de instala√ß√£o!
Ver instru√ß√µes... 1. Adicione o manifesto `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/master/manifest.json` como um reposit√≥rio de plugins Jellyfin ao seu servidor. 2. Instale o plugin `InPlayerEpisodePreview` a partir do reposit√≥rio. 3. Reinicie o servidor Jellyfin.
### Cliente Desktop Jellyfin Media Player (JMP) (Descontinuado)
Ver instru√ß√µes... **Descontinuado com a vers√£o JMP [1.11.0](https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin-media-player/releases/tag/v1.11.0)** Como o novo cliente JMP est√° usando o player web atual do pr√≥prio servidor, n√£o √© mais necess√°rio fazer altera√ß√µes diretamente no c√≥digo do cliente. Esta √© a forma recomendada de instalar o script no cliente desktop.

Content:
If you don't feel comfortable editing the nativeshell.js file yourself (step 3 to 6), you can download the full release instead, which includes the script already added to the nativeshell.js file.
It is yet unclear if there could be potential issues, replacing the nativeshell.js file with the one from the release, so it is recommended to follow all steps below.

1. Download the latest release [JMP](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/releases/download/v1.1.0.0/inPlayerEpisodePreview-1.1.0.0-jmp.zip) or [JMP-full](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/releases/download/v1.1.0.0/inPlayerEpisodePreview-1.1.0.0-jmp-full.zip) (includes the script already added to the nativeshell.js file)
2. Extract the zip file into your Jellyfin directory (e.g. C:\Program Files\Jellyfin\Jellyfin Media Player)
3. Inside your Jellyfin directory follow the folder path "web-client\extension"
4. Open the "nativeshell.js" file in a text editor.
5. Inside the file find the section `const plugins = [];`. Add a new line at the start of the list and paste in `'inPlayerEpisodePreviewPlugin',`. The section should now look similar to this:
Translation:
Se voc√™ n√£o se sentir confort√°vel editando o arquivo nativeshell.js por conta pr√≥pria (passos 3 a 6), pode baixar o release completo, que j√° inclui o script adicionado ao arquivo nativeshell.js.
Ainda n√£o est√° claro se pode haver problemas potenciais ao substituir o arquivo nativeshell.js pelo da vers√£o release, portanto, √© recomendado seguir todos os passos abaixo.

1. Baixe a vers√£o mais recente [JMP](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/releases/download/v1.1.0.0/inPlayerEpisodePreview-1.1.0.0-jmp.zip) ou [JMP-full](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/releases/download/v1.1.0.0/inPlayerEpisodePreview-1.1.0.0-jmp-full.zip) (inclui o script j√° adicionado ao arquivo nativeshell.js)
2. Extraia o arquivo zip no diret√≥rio do Jellyfin (ex.: C:\Program Files\Jellyfin\Jellyfin Media Player)
3. Dentro do diret√≥rio do Jellyfin, siga o caminho de pastas "web-client\extension"
4. Abra o arquivo "nativeshell.js" em um editor de texto.
5. Dentro do arquivo, encontre a se√ß√£o `const plugins = [];`. Adicione uma nova linha no in√≠cio da lista e cole `'inPlayerEpisodePreviewPlugin',`. A se√ß√£o dever√° ficar semelhante a isto:

6. Save the file and restart the JMP client.

## üí° Troubleshooting

### 1. The preview button isn't visible
This is most likely related to wrong permissions for the `index.html` file.

<details>
<summary> See a list of possible solutions... </summary>

#### 1.1 Avoid this issue by using the [file-transformation](https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-file-transformation) plugin.

#### 1.2 Change Ownership inside a docker container
If you're running jellyfin in a docker container, you can change the ownership with thie following command
(replace jellyfin with your containername, user and group with the user and group of your container):
Translation:
6. Salve o arquivo e reinicie o cliente JMP.
</details>

### 1. O bot√£o de pr√©-visualiza√ß√£o n√£o est√° vis√≠vel
Isso provavelmente est√° relacionado a permiss√µes incorretas para o arquivo `index.html`.

#### 1.1 Evite esse problema usando o plugin [file-transformation](https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-file-transformation).

#### 1.2 Altere a propriedade dentro de um cont√™iner docker

RowTranslations.originContent: If you're running jellyfin in a docker container, you can change the ownership with thie following command

RowTranslations.originContent: (replace jellyfin with your containername, user and group with the user and group of your container):
RowTranslations.translatedContent: (substitua jellyfin pelo nome do seu cont√™iner, usu√°rio e grupo pelo usu√°rio e grupo do seu cont√™iner):

Content:
```
docker exec -it --user root jellyfin chown user:group /jellyfin/jellyfin-web/index.html && docker restart jellyfin
```
Translation:
```
docker exec -it --user root jellyfin chown user:group /jellyfin/jellyfin-web/index.html && docker restart jellyfin
```

Content:
You can run this as a cron job on system startup. (Thanks to [muisje](https://github.com/muisje) for helping with [this](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/issues/49#issue-2825745530) solution) #### 1.3 Change Ownership running on a Windows installation 1. Navigate to: `C:\Program Files\Jellyfin\Server\jellyfin-web\` 2. Right-click on `index.html` ‚Üí `Properties` ‚Üí `Security tab` ‚Üí Click on `Edit` 3. Select your user from the list and check the Write `permission` box. 4. Restart both the server and client. (Thanks to [xeuc](https://github.com/xeuc) for [this](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/issues/49#issuecomment-2746136069) solution) If none of the above solutions work, please have a look at old issues. E.g. [here](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/issues/10) or [here](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/issues/49).

If you encounter any error which you can't solve yourself, feel free to open up an issue.
Please keep in mind that any system is different which can lead to unexpected behaviour, so add as much information about it as possible.
Jellyfin logs and console logs from the browser (prefixed as [InPlayerEpisodePreview]) are always useful. ## Credits The plugin structure is based and inspired on the [Jellyscrub](https://github.com/nicknsy/jellyscrub) plugin by [NickNSY](https://github.com/nicknsy).
Translation:
Voc√™ pode executar isso como um trabalho cron na inicializa√ß√£o do sistema. (Obrigado ao [muisje](https://github.com/muisje) por ajudar com [esta](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/issues/49#issue-2825745530) solu√ß√£o) #### 1.3 Alterar Propriedade em uma instala√ß√£o Windows 1. Navegue at√©: `C:\Program Files\Jellyfin\Server\jellyfin-web\` 2. Clique com o bot√£o direito em `index.html` ‚Üí `Propriedades` ‚Üí `Aba Seguran√ßa` ‚Üí Clique em `Editar` 3. Selecione seu usu√°rio na lista e marque a caixa de permiss√£o de Escrita. 4. Reinicie tanto o servidor quanto o cliente. (Obrigado ao [xeuc](https://github.com/xeuc) por [esta](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/issues/49#issuecomment-2746136069) solu√ß√£o) Se nenhuma das solu√ß√µes acima funcionar, por favor veja os problemas antigos. Por exemplo [aqui](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/issues/10) ou [aqui](https://github.com/Namo2/InPlayerEpisodePreview/issues/49).

Se voc√™ encontrar qualquer erro que n√£o consiga resolver sozinho, sinta-se √† vontade para abrir um chamado.
Por favor, lembre-se que cada sistema √© diferente, o que pode levar a comportamentos inesperados, ent√£o adicione o m√°ximo de informa√ß√µes poss√≠vel.
Logs do Jellyfin e logs de console do navegador (prefixados como [InPlayerEpisodePreview]) s√£o sempre √∫teis. ## Cr√©ditos A estrutura do plugin √© baseada e inspirada no plugin [Jellyscrub](https://github.com/nicknsy/jellyscrub) de [NickNSY](https://github.com/nicknsy).
